  • Method Details

    • create

      Variants create(Variants.Config config)
      Create a new instance of Variants

      Note: caller is responsible for calling AutoOpen.open() and calling the when done

      Parameters:
      config - the Variants configuration for the new instance
      Returns:
      the new Variants instance
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if config is null or when configuration is invalid

    • create

      Variants create(Consumer<Variants.Config.Builder> builderConsumer)
      Create a new instance of Variants
      Parameters:
      builderConsumer - the config builder consumer callback
      Returns:
      the new Variants instance
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if builderConsumer is null or when configuration is invalid

    • install

      void install(Variants.Config config, io.github.jonloucks.contracts.api.Repository repository)
      Install all the requirements and promises to the given Contracts Environment. Include Variants#CONTRACT which will private a unique
      Parameters:
      config - the Variants config
      repository - the repository to add requirements and promises to
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if config is null, config is invalid, or repository is null
